tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: *** ** **** **** ******* listens to the problems of the patient minutely and suggests the best options available for treatment. I was about to come to the clinic now to inform the doctor that my wife is Ok now by God's Grace  She is taking electral and trying to recover. Thankyou so much for helping us out in every hour of need.

tags: Wait time,
review:
I had an appointment with the doctor at 5. I called day before to confirm about the appointment as well and the receptionist told me she’ll call me in an hour. Did not receive a call back. I reached at the clinic at 5 and was told the doctor will be available At 6:30 as she’s not in the clinic. They didn’t even bother to inform before and I was standing in the rain because it’s so difficult to locate their clinic as well. 

Please keep your patients informed about the timings of the doctor or update the correct timings here as nobody has so much time, money and effort to waxte. I literally came and went back for nothing.
